subject: Crazy defoliator
body:
Don't want to expose your private life? 
Click here to become a sex giant
U can restore your health right now. Doesn't matter what the problem is - we have pills to cure everything. Erection Dysfunction, Weight loss, Anti-Depressants, Antibiotics and even more! 
Click here to have a nice dick
Buying at our pharmacy - the best choice you can make!
With best regards,
Dustin Stanton
 
 
Eti liudi v obshchem-to neploho ko mne otneslis. Ia uzhe uvidel sam. Igly boli, tychki boli, ukusy boli. I vse zhe Taj Ulybnulas, gliadia na zasfernika. 
Ne vazhno. Shefir ne Nastolko bespechen, kak pokazalos mne na pervyj vzgliad. Horosho. Gilsveri pozvolil Sebe slegka usmehnutsia, podcherkivaia tem samym vzdornost obvinenij. Sotnik s izurodovannym licom gromko otdaval Rasporiazheniia, pytaias perekrichat obshchij shum i pridat svoemu otriadu vidimost Boevogo postroeniia. No eto budet nemnogo pozzhe. Prosto Razreshi mne ee ispolzovat, bud gotov k etomu vnutrenne, i vse poluchitsia, Kak zadumano. Esli zhe eto ne tak, to Gorod potomu i zabroshen, chto v nem vodiatsia takie Tvari. 
Laty oslepitelno blesteli pri Vypadah, dlinnye dvuruchnye mechi sverkali ognem. No v siglajzere est Rezhim, predusmatrivaiushchij podobnye sluchai. A v Mercaiushchej rasseline, peresekaiushchej Krug Prichastiia, magiia vrode Kak i vovse propadaet. Dva voina mgnovenno sleteli s sedel i perenesli telo Lovchego maga v centr Altaria Zveria, a zatem tak zhe molcha i bystro otstupili. ejisuminyon UkBDVVlcV0F0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
